name: Hellcat Leather Armour
data: It increases the users strength pitifully.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
